content:
NoMad Hotel Rooms at The Evelyn

Inspired by History, Designed Just for You

Enjoy   comfortable NoMad hotel rooms in the heart of Manhattan at The Evelyn Hotel. Luxurious Frette linens, bath products formulated by classic apothecary C.O. Bigelow, and a wide range of complimentary perks such as free Wi-Fi make for stays that are as comfortable as they are convenient. Our boutique NYC hotel rooms come in a wide range of classes and sizes to accommodate almost any preference. Explore our hotel near Madison Square Park by visiting the links below, view pictures in the visual gallery, and please feel free to contact us if we can assist you in any way as you plan your stay.
